post.body: Why use pins when you can use Mighty Mendit! :)
I don't have a face book either...
Box potatoes? YUMMY! BTW, did you get my link tip over at the WF earlier? We also need to talk about my PressRelease...
Kinda like your new twit avatar...
Ditto on slightly more friendly (since your demographic is families) bio photo plus you need smiling kids on the sales page :)
Got it, yep, life's like that. I'm having issues finding new health insurance. Joy!
BTW, was this inspired by a certain aussie lady? Hmmm...?
If you need help, send me a DM.
I'm already wearing it with bells, don't you see it?
Then why don't you put on a Christmas hat?
OOHH, feisty, OK, but I still want to see a hat...
I've never heard of any adult autistic being cured. Still waiting for the hat...
I want to see you with a Christmas hat like Jay :)
Poor souls, I wish them well...
I think we'll have to do that, yes.
Finally, thanks to all the people who graciously offered their testimonials.
Plus several thousand extra dollars for all the coaching clients... Gotta love the WF and all the people there, THANK YOU!
BTW, my blog flipping ebook WSO passed the 100 customers mark recently, WOOHOO!!!
Merry Christmas and a Happy and very Prosperous New Year to us all!!!!
Started using my own name at EZA and my bio clicks are outnumbering my article clicks(so far) WTHeck is that all about?
